title: So you want to know when the Moxie's going to open...
body:
You know how TV shows end certain episodes with a cliffhanger? Well, that's the effect I was going for with last night's post. Don't you worry, I'll let everyone on the blog know the date before anyone else. We're planning on writing a press release to be sent out on the first, but I'll let the cat out of the bag in a few days. We still have a few details to iron out to make sure we can meet the date.

Now, I'm off to the theater to help our installer work on the projector.

PS - I'll give you a hint on the date: it's in September.
author: Dan

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: Gosh darn you. I bet it's either the 16 or the 23! Of course you didn't say September of 2005... Heh heh.

comments.author: Aaron Scott
comments.body: I know when it is. I'll take bids for the real answer.

comments.author: Stephanie
comments.body:
Hooray!

I'm so excited for you guys...an open Moxie would make a neat, if completely useless-to-me birthday present. How about the 7th?

comments.author: Derek the local college student
comments.body: I'm waiting on the edge of my seat. I hope it's not the 23rd, because I have a concert to go to that night, and I want to be at opening night. Not that you care or anything, but I felt compelled to share that. I'm hoping for the 9th, because that would be the perfect ending to a long week. Do it. You know you want to. You've never met me, but you'd make my month, haha. Okay, I'm gonna stop rambling now.

comments.author: whitty
comments.body:
I think I just crapped myself a little. From excitement, that is.

Man, I am going out of town three out of four weekend in September. Here's hoping I choose the right one to stay home!

comments.author: Nate
comments.body: Same here.  But a Moxie/Coldplay hybrid weekend would be suh-weet indeedy.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Another small tidbit: we're staying true to our unconventionality. Who says opening night is a weekend? It could be a Monday morning at 6 am.

comments.author: erin
comments.body:
why not make it five am nicole?!
early bird gets the best moxie seat.

comments.author: Rachel
comments.body: Sept. 15th is the first day of National Hispanic Heritage Month...I know how much you two love Qdoba.

comments.author: Craig
comments.body: You're killing me. How am I supposed to get a decently-priced plane ticket if I don't know at least a month in advance?

comments.author: Ole
comments.body: Nicole is sounding awfully cocky about that date.  A good sign!  Oh and Aaron, will the sign be ready by then?

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body:
so people that comment the most get a chance to buy tickets first... right?...
... thats right.... right?...
... please...
PLLEEEAAAASSSEE! I LOVE YOU! .... err

comments.author: Nate
comments.body: What!

comments.author: Nate
comments.body: A!

comments.author: Nate
comments.body: Great!

comments.author: Nate
comments.body: Idea!

comments.author: Andy
comments.body: I predict an opening on September 16 with screenings of Thumbsucker.

comments.author: Mark
comments.body:
My money is on the 9th!

Any update on the founding members program?

M

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: My chair is moist with anticipation...

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: Sept. 16 would be a great date to open! And I hope you do get that movie.

comments.author: nicholas
comments.body: I'm so happy for you two! I've been lurking lately, but always here...

comments.author: Jennifer
comments.body: Founding members first?  What?  Doesn't money talk anymore?

comments.author: GO Magazine
comments.body: A FREE copy of GO to whoever guesses the right date. We'll have the scoop (and a sweet feature) in our Aug. 31 issue.

comments.author: Jay
comments.body:
Well, Nicole, if you want a Monday morning opening, the 5th is not only a treasured national holiday, it's also my birthday. Perhaps a Moxie opening would blunt the crushing blows of time that are pummeling my rapidly aging body.
Yeah.

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: I'll put my money on Friday 2nd :)
